subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: Off Newport, R.I., 25 vintage yachts, some more than 70 years old, evoked the heyday of six-meter racing, right down to the varnished teak.
snippet: Off Newport, R.I., 25 vintage yachts, some more than 70 years old, evoked the heyday of six-meter racing, right down to the varnished teak.
